Item_1.Title: 14-kt. Green Jade Hoops
Item_1.Content: Hoops of cool green jade restbetween 14-karat yellow gold endpieces. The hoops graduate in thickness from3 mm at the ends to 6 mm in the center, with approximately 29 mm overalldiameter.

Item_2.Title: 14-kt. Jade Doughnut Pendant
Item_2.Content: The 25-mm disk hangs delicatelyfrom a 14-karat gold chain. The disk features a dramatic gold Chinese characterin the center, accompanied by four stylized gold bees.

Item_3.Title: 14-kt. Charcoal Jade and Ruby Elephant Pendant
Item_3.Content: Carved of rich dark grey jade,this elephant pendant has 14-karat yellow gold applied to mark the feet,tusk, tail, and blanket. A 2-mm round faceted ruby in a gold bezel settingforms the eye. The pendant hangs from an 18-inch chain.

Item_4.Title: 14-kt. Carved Lavender Jade Earrings
Item_4.Content: Luscious 8-mm lavender jade balls, carved with intricate Asian style, dangle from a 14-karat yellow gold French hook.

Item_5.Title: 14-kt. Jade Cross Pendant
Item_5.Content: Green jade and gold create thisbeautiful cross pendant. Cylindrical bars of green jade feature caps andcenter of 14-karat yellow gold.

Item_6.Title: 14-kt. Multicolored Jade Earrings
Item_6.Content: A delicate wrapping of 14-karatyellow gold wire holds six 6 x 4 pear shapes of jade in various shades: brilliantgreen, orange, lavender, black, pale yellow, and white. The post earringshave butterfly backs.

Item_7.Title: 14-kt. Multicolored Jade Ring
Item_7.Content: A delicate wrapping of 14-karatyellow gold wire holds six 6 x 4 ovals of jade in various shades: brilliantgreen, orange, lavender, black, pale yellow, and white. A narrow gold banddivides to support the setting.

Item_8.Title: 14-kt. Onyx and Ruby Elephant Pendant
Item_8.Content: Carved of rich black onyx, thiselephant pendant has 14-karat yellow gold applied to mark the feet, tusk,tail, and blanket. A 2-mm round faceted ruby in a gold bezel setting formsthe eye. The pendant hangs from an 18-inch chain.
